revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Linksys |model=WRVS4400N |revision=v2.0 (Cisco) |asin=B000H97UC0 |fcc_date=07/09/2008 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=SerComm |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=Q87-WRVS4400NV2 |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Star |cpu1_model=STR9202 |cpu1_cspeed=250 |cpu2_brand=Star |cpu2_model=STR9109 |cpu2_cspeed=250 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=STMicroelectronics |fla1_model=25P64V6P |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5DS16M16CS-5T |ram1_num=2 |ram2=16 |ram2_brand=Nanya |ram2_model=NT5DS8M16FS-5T |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI |expansion_minipci_num=1 |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial=yes |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT2860T |wi1_chip2_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip2_model=RT2820L |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Star |eth_chip2_model=STR9109 |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Vitesse |sw_model=VSC7385XYV |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=00:1C:10 |oui_eth=00:1C:10 }} {{TagLine|Wireless-N Gigabit Security VPN Router}} :[http://www.cisco.com/en/US/products/ps9931/index.html Product page] ([[Cisco]]) :[http://www.cisco.com/en/US/docs/routers/csbr/wrvs4400n/administration/guide/WRVS4400N_AG_OL-20048.pdf Administration guide] The manual on the Cisco-Linksys site says the default SSID is 'ciscosb'. :The manual in the FCC documents says the default SSID is 'linksys-n'. The wireless module is a ''SerComm'' device, board ID: YG300MOA-1.0 The [[Star]] STR9109 appears to handle the WLAN while :the STR9202 handles the Ethernet interfaces. :[[Star]] STR9202 ([[Cavium]] CNS1202) - 2GbE (internal) :[[Star]] STR9109 ([[Cavium]] CNS1109) - 1GbE (internal) :Vitesse VSC7385 (SparX G5) - 1GbE (WAN), 4 GbE (LAN), 1 GbE (internal) ===Wikis=== *[http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/cisco/wrvs4400n_v2 ''Cisco WRVS4400n'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki] 
Hardware Info
Architecture:	ARM
Vendor:		Cavium Networks
Bootloader:	ARMboot
System-On-Chip1:STR 9202 CPU: FA526id(wb) revision 1
CPU1/Speed	250 MHz
System-On-Chip2:STR 9109 CPU: FA526id(wb) revision 1
CPU2/Speed	250 MHz
Flash-Chip:	ST 25P64V6P
Flash size:	8 MiB
RAM		NT5DS8M16FS-6K/5T 128? MiB
RAM CPU1:	64 MiB
RAM CPU2:	16 / 32? MiB
Wireless:	RT2800 802.11n (Device ID: 1814:0601)
Ethernet:	Vitesse VSC7385 Gigabit w/ vlan support swconfig
Internet:	10/100/1000
USB:		No
Serial:		Yes
JTAG:		No
===Forum threads=== *[http://wl500g.info/showthread.php?25538-%CF%F0%EE%F8%E8%E2%EA%E0-%EE%F2-%FD%ED%F2%F3%E7%E8%E0%F1%F2%EE%E2-%E4%EB%FF-Linksys-WRT150N-610N-v2&p=248217#post248217 Pictures on the '''wl500g.info''' forums] *[http://www.hydrogenaudio.org/forums/index.php?showtopic=58720 ''Shell access on the WRVS4400N''] (linked from [http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=22577 here on the '''DD-WRT''' forums]) *[http://homecommunity.cisco.com/t5/Wireless-Routers/stable-Firmware-for-WRVS4400N-with-working-IPv6/td-p/279867 ''Stable Firmware for WRVS4400N with working IPv6'' on the '''Linksys''' forums] :links to the firmware [http://www.tytec.de/Project4.htm here] __NOTOC__
